question: The vending machines sell pretzels for 85 cents and popcorn for 100 cents. Henry spent £12 and got 4 bags of pretzels and had 5% of his money left in change. How many popcorn did he buy?
answer:
Henry got £0.6 in change because £12*5/100 = <<12*5/100=0.6>>0.6
Henry spent £11.4 because 12 - 0.6 = <<12-0.6=11.4>>11.4
Henry spent £3.4 on pretzels because 4*0.85 = <<4*0.85=3.4>>3.4
Henry spent 8 on popcorn because 11.4 - 3.4 = <<11.4-3.4=8>>8
Henry bought 8 popcorn because 8 / 1 = <<8=8>>8
#### 8
